name: Sadistomatic
overview: The player mans a ground based AA gun. Helicopters and bombers fly overhead dropping paratroopers and bombs. The player must prevent these from landing , when enough of them have made it to earth, they turn into a tank and destroy the players gun. Every shot fired costs points but these can be regained by bringing down aircraft and paratroopers. The game is actually a ROM hack of the 1983 Rabbit Software game, Paratroopers, but with a change in the background's color, improved SFX, and added music.
